Name: M 22 - Amy E. Millard, Conflicts of Interest Board
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF AMY E. MILLARD AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST BOARD.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text:
RESOLVED, Pursuant to Section 2602 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of Amy E. Millard as a member of the New York City Conflicts of Interest Board to serve a six-year term beginning on April 1, 2024, and expiring on March 31, 2030.

COUPLED ON GO
